alert.note: Alert for Southampton (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 06 at 4:28PM EDT until May 06 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM EDT FOR HERTFORD...NORTHWESTERN GATES AND SOUTH CENTRAL SOUTHAMPTON COUNTIES... At 428 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Winton, or near Murfreesboro, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Roduco around 435 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Tunis, Eure, Menola, Chowan Beach, Topsy, Mapleton, Buckland, Dort, Union and Riddicksville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for northeastern North Carolina...and southeastern Virginia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
